alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 12 at 3:27AM MDT until April 13 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations ranging from 1 to 3 inches along the Interstate 90 corridor to 3 to 7 inches near and along the Montana border through this evening. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph later this morning into this evening. * WHERE...Western Crook County and Northern Campbell County. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
